title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Luka Doncic after the Mavericks lost game 2 against the Suns and why his dominance is actually bad for Dallas in the postseason. He warns the 76ers against extending James Harden to a max contract since his disappointing performance in the playoff series against the Heat. Colin lists his top 10 most valuable players, plus new Buccaneers head coach Todd Bowles joins the show to talk about his relationship with Tom Brady. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
